statements: DELETE FROM GeneticData WHERE patient_id = 2 AND data_date > '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE treatment_id = 101 AND patient_id = 501
DELETE FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 AND frequency = 'Twice a day'
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Genetic Disorders'
DELETE FROM PatientGeneticData WHERE patient_id = 123 AND age < 30;
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer' OR diagnosis = 'Diabetes' OR diagnosis = 'Heart Disease';
